definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: Shrimp, fish, scallops, seafood-tomato broth, parmesan cheese.
sentences.chinese: 大蝦，魚，乾貝，海鮮茄汁高湯，帕瑪森芝士。

sentences.english: Clam chowders have --- as the name suggests --- clams and fish stock.
sentences.chinese: 蛤蜊海鮮雜燴裏面還有蛤蜊和魚類高湯。

sentences.english: The Milk chafing dish is stew the mushroom and chicken soup-stock powder for 1 hours.
sentences.chinese: 湯底是燉煮一小時的牛奶加蘑菇加高湯雞粉。

sentences.english: Consider using stock, broth or wine instead of water.
sentences.chinese: 考慮一下用高湯，骨頭濃湯或者葡萄酒代替水。

sentences.english: Clean rice, soak for 30 minutes, add broth to cook.
sentences.chinese: 米洗淨，浸泡約30分鐘，加入高湯熬煮。

sentences.english: Broth does not NEED to be made with stock, it can start as plain water.
sentences.chinese: 高湯並不一定要用原湯，也可以用清水。

sentences.english: For instance, substitute vegetable stock for plain water when making rice.
sentences.chinese: 比如在做米飯時用蔬菜高湯代替平時的水。

definition: katsuobushi or dried bonito flakes (paper-thin shavings of preserved skipjack tuna)
